description: Throughout the years our Fuckingmachines have nailed Phoenix every which way imaginable. She always had her favorite machine: the Hammer, that was a guaranteed orgasm with ejaculation. But this time we had a new combination for her: the Intruder pointing up with Phoenix lying on a sloped table. The result was the most powerful orgasm she has ever experienced, and a squirt that lasted about a minute. Phoenix now has a new favorite.
title: Phoenix
